name: sortable
title: Sortable
description: A simple block that allows to sort its content based on date.
author: Taras Dashkevych

scripts.minify:scripts: rm -f assets/scripts/*.min.js && echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building JS Files$(tput sgr0)"; for f in assets/scripts/*.js; do file=${f%.js}; echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building $f$(tput sgr0)"; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.prod: npm run format && npm run lint:css:fix && npm run build && npm run plugin-zip
